scenario_text.value:
Takuma, tell me, do you honestly think we can
beat the other three?
You mean the other Holy Beasts?

Yeah. You think we can go up against guys
that strong and keep winning?

Oh, I mean, don’t get me wrong! I’m not
scared or anything!
I’m just trying to be realistic! That’s all!

(Realistic... We don’t know anything about
the enemy, so we’ve gotta be realistic.)

(But honestly, I’m worried too. I totally get
where Ryo’s coming from.)

(Well, even if we’re this worried, the other
Holy Beasts might not want to fight.)
(How should I reply to Ryo?)
Won’t know till we try!
Okay to be scared.
Maybe they’re nice?

Well, we won’t know until we try. And it’s
not like we can afford not to try.

True, but that doesn’t make it seem any more
likely.

It’s okay to be scared. If I’m being honest,
I’m pretty anxious myself.
You too?

Yeah... Thinking of opponents as strong as
Baihumon⁠—maybe even stronger⁠—freaks me out.
I see... So you get worried too, sometimes.

That’s kinda a relief, actually. Feels like
it’ll work out if we’re on the same page.
Oh yeah? You think?

Yeah... If you get scared, then you know how
to encourage someone when they feel it, yeah?
Oh, yeah I get it. Sure, leave it to me.

Maybe the other Holy Beasts are nice
and peaceful? Then we won’t have to fight.
Dude... Are you being serious right now?

Urk... No, I mean, the possibility is super
low, I’m sure...

No shit... Besides, we should be thinking
about the worst case scenario here.

Then again, maybe with Kunemon’s help,
everything will turn out all right.
Kew?

Or maybe not. Do you think I’m being overly
optimistic?
Kewkewww!

No, I like how you’re thinking. That’s how I
feel about having Agumon and everyone else.
Right? But I just don’t know...

Don’t worry about it. Together, we’ve got the
power to smash through all those doubts.

All right, well, I’m gonna hold you to that,
okay? I’m putting my faith in you.

I’ll put my faith in you too. As long as we
believe in each another, we can do anything.
Yeah, right on! I’m going to believe!

Can’t help being worried at this point, but
we should prepare for the worst, too.
